title: Failed Project Entry
description: Schema for a single failed project entry in The Failed Projects Registry.

id.description: Unique identifier for the project (e.g., proj-001).

submitted_by.description: The GitHub username of the person who submitted the entry.

title.description: The name of the failed project.

description.description: A detailed description of the project idea.

tags.description: List of keywords or categories associated with the project.

attempts_count.description: Number of times this idea was attempted.

reasons_for_failure.description: Predefined reasons for the project's failure.

attempts.description: Details of each attempt made on the project.

description.description: Description of what was done in this attempt.

links.description: Relevant links for this specific attempt (e.g., repo, postmortem).

lessons_learned.description: Key takeaways or lessons learned from the project's failure.
